summary: A man seeks revenge after a biker gang murders his family.
cast: José Gras|Laura Premica|Andrea Albani|Peter Saunders|Brian Billings|Eric Falk|Helmi Sigg|Garry Membrini|Ana Roca|Diana Miller|Hank Sutter|Irene Semmling|Mary-Ann Vaughn|Guillermo Balcázar|Paul Grau|Antonio Molino Rojo|Esther Studer|Hans R. Walthard
title: Los violadores
